output:
I met a man of six feet four Said life's a game I've played before
So take my word, I'll leave for sure These memories leave wanting more
A winter's night, a summer's day I watched it all just slip away
Through my fingers, watch you walk away Watch you walk away
Son, I'll tell you this Once it's gone, it's gone for good
If I could take it back, you know I would I never thought a heart could break
For heaven's sake Son, don't make the same mistake
Don't let her slip away Don't let her slip away
